author: Tom Perrotta
title: Serena Williams Can’t Resist Paris
text:
It’s been nearly two years since Serena Williams last played a clay court match at the French Open, back in 2016 when she lost in the final. She gave birth to a daughter this past September and has played just four professional tennis matches so far this year during her comeback, losing two of them. Of the 23 Grand Slam tournaments she has won in her career, only three came on the red clay of Paris. She has won each of the other three Slams at least six times.
With all that, there’s little reason for Williams to play at Roland... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
